full_summary:
# RFC: Workspace-as-a-Service Office Space Pilot Project
-----------------------------

**Reference information:**

- **Solicitation Number:** WS3657151950
- **Publication Date:** September 8, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM PT
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 9, 2023

**Notice Information:**

- **Category:** SRV (Services)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Methods:** Competitive – Selective Tendering

**Background:**

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires Workspace-as-a-Service office space to support a maximum workforce of 30 employees. The space must be located within a 750 meters radius of a transit stop along the Fast and Frequent Transit Network, Translink, and within the geographic boundaries of Surrey, British Columbia.

**Key Requirements:**

- Dedicated, contiguous workspace for up to 30 employees, including 20 workstations.
- Accessibility to public transportation via a transit stop along the Fast and Frequent Transit Network.
- Location within the City of Surrey's geographic boundaries, specifically:
  • North: Highway 17
  • East: 156th Street
  • South: 72nd Avenue
  • West: 120th Street

**Security Requirements:**

This requirement includes applicable security requirements, which will be detailed in the solicitation document.

**Virtual Bidders' Conference:**

A virtual bidders' conference will be held on September 29, 2022, at 2:00 PM PT, for all interested bidders.

**Debriefing/Feedback:**

Applicants who submitted responses to the previous bid solicitation, EZ899-200767/B (canceled on January 16, 2020), may request a debriefing or feedback session.

**Contact Information:**

- Contact Name: Thomas Leboeuf, PSPC/SPAC
- Contact Email: [thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Contact Phone: Not provided
- Contact Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**View Solicitation:**

Visit the official tender notice URL to access the solicitation document: [http://dis
